bio.about: Energetic Software Engineer with can-do attitude and experience in building ES applications while reaching maximum application performance. Supportive and motivated team player, consistently sharing ideas how to improve project process and efficiency. Proficient building isomorphic and Progressive Web Applications.

highlights: Developed and maintained React CLI to create multiple types React Application Boilerplates with PWA features
Developed centralized Webpack configuration which is being used by various applications and is extendable
Lead* (spearheaded) engineering brand new CSS design system pattern used by multiple teams (PostCSS + ITCSS/OOCSS/BEM)
Lead* engineering and building Reusable React Components Library used by multiple teams
Developed Platform CLI which can aggregate multiple React or Angular independent applications and share state
Provided e2e testing using Selenium and automated CI/CD process using Bamboo
Consultant and mentor for other teams
Created multiple registration sites for various companies such as, HIMSS, ASA and CES, and used by 12,000+ registrants.
Designed custom administrative front-ends for clients by using Javascript frameworks such as React.
Utilized responsive design to create mobile-first websites with the help of Bootstrap and Foundation.
Integrated analytic software to ensure clients have up-to-date information about the status of their trade shows
Provided digital media support for clients and publishers
Build JS modules for Scandinavian and UK publishers to showcase Rich Media banners correctly
Part of the team that made Burberry Billboard run on Yahoo sites all around Europe, before format was certified
